compressGeometryParams

  • compressGeometryParams(geometryParams: GeometryParams): GeometryCompressedParams
    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/math/compression/compression.ts:128

    Compresses GeometryParams into GeometryCompressedParams.

    • Simplifies geometry by combining duplicate positions and adjusting indices
    • Generates edge indices for triangle meshes
    • Ignores normals (our shaders auto-generate them)
    • Converts positions to relative-to-center (RTC) coordinates
    • Quantizes positions and UVs as 16-bit unsigned integers
    • Splits geometry into buckets to enable indices to use the minimum bits for storage

    The GeometryCompressedParams can then be given to SceneModel.createGeometryCompressed.

    Special Consideration for SolidPrimitive

    Note that if GeometryParams.primitive is constants.SolidPrimitive and GeometryCompressedParams.geometryBuckets contains more than one GeometryBucketParams, then GeometryCompressedParams.primitive will become constants.SurfacePrimitive, in the assumption that bucketing has split open a closed (solid) triangle mesh, which can therefore no longer be treated as a solid.

    Example 1: Compressing parameters for a small geometry

    The example below demonstrates compression of GeometryParams for a simple geometry that only requires a single bucket.

    Note that if the GeometryParams.positions array was large enough to require some indices to use more than 16 bits for storage, then that's when the bucketing would kick in, to split the mesh into smaller buckets, each with smaller indices that index a subset of the positions.

    import {math, constants} from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@xeokit/xeokit-viewer/dist/xeokit-viewer.es.min.js";

const compressedGeometry = math.compression.compressGeometry({
     id: "myBoxGeometry",
     primitive: constants.TrianglesPrimitive,
     positions: [
         202, 202, 202, 200, 202, 202,
         200, 200, 202, 202, 200, 202,
         202, 202, 202, 202, 200, 202,
         202, 200, 200, 202, 202, 200,
         202, 202, 202, 202, 202, 200,
         200, 202, 200, 200, 202, 202,
         200, 202, 202, 200, 202, 200,
         200, 200, 200, 200, 200, 202,
         200, 200, 200, 202, 200, 200,
         202, 200, 202, 200, 200, 202,
         202, 200, 200, 200, 200, 200,
         200, 202, 200, 202, 202, 200
     ],
     indices: [
         0, 1, 2, 0, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 4,
         6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 8, 10, 11, 12,
         13, 14, 12, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18,
         16, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 20, 22, 23
     ]
 });

    The value of compressedGeometry is:

    {
     id: "myBoxGeometry",
     primitive: constants.TrianglesPrimitive,
     origin: [200,200,200],
     positionsDecompressMatrix: [
         0.00003052270125906143, 0, 0, 0,
         0, 0.00003052270125906143, 0, 0,
         0, 0, 0.00003052270125906143, 0,
         -1, -1, -1, 1
     ],
     geometryBuckets: [
         {
             positionsCompressed: [
                 65525, 65525, 65525, 0, 65525, 65525,
                 0, 0, 65525, 65525, 0, 65525, 65525,
                 0, 0, 65525, 65525, 0, 0, 65525, 0, 0,
                 0, 0
             ],
             indices: [
                 0, 1, 2, 0, 2, 3, 0, 3, 4, 0, 4, 5, 0, 5, 6,
                 0, 6, 1, 1, 6, 7, 1, 7, 2, 7, 4, 3, 7, 3, 2,
                 4, 7, 6, 4, 6, 5
             ],
             edgeIndices: [
                 3, 4, 0, 4, 5, 0, 5, 6,
                 0, 6, 1, 1, 6, 7, 1, 7,
                 3, 2, 4, 7, 6, 4, 6
             ]
         }
     ]
}

    Parameters

    • geometryParams: GeometryParams

      Uncompressed geometry params.

    Returns GeometryCompressedParams

    Compressed geometry params.
